summary: Being imprisoned for murdering a politician, husband tells his wife why he did this.
cast: Romy Schneider|Michel Piccoli|Helmut Griem|Dominique Labourier|Gérard Klein|Mathieu Carrière|Jacques Martin|Wendelin Werner|Marcel Bozonnet|Christiane Cohendy|Pierre Michaël|Véronique Silver|Maria Schell|Raymond Aquilon|Béatrice Avoine|Martine de Breteuil|Arnaud Carbonnier|Patricia Cartier|André Chaumeau|Alain MacMoy|Stephan Meldegg|Jacques Nolot|Pierre Pernet|Jean Reno|Isabelle Sadoyan
title: Testimonio de mujer
